languages.text: {n}Яростная складка разрезает лоб проктора, но волна гнева стихает, так и не поднявшись.{/n} "Что бы ты ни творил раньше, я признаю, что сейчас ты поступаешь достойно. И признаю за тобой право собственного приговора — именем Лекс Империалис, пусть это тебе зачтется на последнем суде".

{n}A furious line cuts across Solomorne's brow, but the wave of anger recedes before it can rise.{/n} "Whatever your past deeds, I admit that you are making an honourable choice now. I recognise your right to choose your own sentence — by the Lex Imperialis, may this act be taken into account when you face your final judgement."
languages.original_text: {n}Яростная складка разрезает лоб проктора, но волна гнева стихает, так и не поднявшись.{/n} "Что бы ты ни творил раньше, я признаю, что сейчас ты поступаешь достойно. И признаю за тобой право собственного приговора — именем Лекс Империалис, пусть это тебе зачтется на последнем суде".

I recognise your right to choose your own sentence — by the Lex Imperialis, may this act be taken into account when you face your final judgement."

{n}A furious line cuts across Solomorne's brow, but the wave of anger recedes before it can rise.{/n} "Whatever your past deeds, I admit that you are now making an honourable choice. I recognise your right to choose your own sentence — by the Lex Imperialis, may this act be taken into account when you face your final judgement."

{n}A furious line cuts across Solomorne's brow, but the wave of anger recedes before it can rise.{/n} "Whatever your past deeds, I admit that you are now making an honourable choice. I recognise your right to choose your own sentence — by the Lex Imperialis, let this act be taken into account when you face your final judgement."

{n}A furious line cuts across Solomorne's brow, but the wave of anger recedes before it can rise.{/n} "Whatever your past deeds, I admit that you are now making an honourable choice. I recognise your right to choose your own sentence — by the Lex Imperialis, let this act be taken into account when you face your final judgement."

{n}A furious line cuts across Solomorne's brow, but the wave of anger recedes before it can rise.{/n} "Whatever your past deeds, I admit that you are making an honourable choice now. I recognise your right to choose your own sentence — by the Lex Imperialis, may this act be taken into account when you face your final judgement."

{n}A furious line cuts across Solomorne's brow, but the wave of anger recedes before it can rise.{/n} "Whatever your past deeds, I admit that you are making an honourable choice now. I recognise your right to choose your own sentence — by the Lex Imperialis, may this act be taken into account when you face your final judgement."

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙的额头上出现了一道愤怒的皱纹，但他的怒意在爆发前就消散了。{/n}“无论你过去做了什么，我都得承认，你此时此刻做出了光荣的选择。我承认，你有权选择自己的判决。根据《帝国法典》规定，在你面临最终的审判时，愿你的正义之举将会被考虑在内。”
languages.original_text: {n}A furious line cuts across Solomorne's brow, but the wave of anger recedes before it can rise.{/n} "Whatever your past deeds, I admit that you are making an honourable choice now. I recognise your right to choose your own sentence — by the Lex Imperialis, may this act be taken into account when you face your final judgement."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙的额头上出现了一道愤怒的皱纹，但他的怒意在爆发前就消散了。{/n}“无论你过去做了什么，我都得承认，你此时此刻做出了光荣的选择。我承认，你有权选择自己的判决。根据《帝国法典》规定，在你面临最终的审判时，愿你的正义之举将会被考虑在内。”
{n}索罗蒙的额头上浮现了一道愤怒的皱纹，但他的怒意在爆发之前就消散了。{/n}“无论你过去做了什么，我都得承认，你此时此刻做出了光荣的选择。我承认，你有权选择自己的判决。根据《帝国法典》规定，在你面临最终的审判时，你的正义之举将会被考虑在内。”

languages.text: {n}Una línea furiosa atraviesa el ceño de Solomorne, pero la ola de ira retrocede antes de alzarse.{/n} «Dejando a un lado sus actos anteriores, admito que ahora está tomando una decisión honrada. Reconozco su derecho a elegir su propia sentencia: por la Lex Imperialis, que esto se tome en cuenta cuando se enfrente a su juicio final».
languages.original_text: {n}A furious line cuts across Solomorne's brow, but the wave of anger recedes before it can rise.{/n} "Whatever your past deeds, I admit that you are making an honourable choice now. I recognise your right to choose your own sentence — by the Lex Imperialis, may this act be taken into account when you face your final judgement."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una línea furiosa atraviesa el ceño de Solomorne, pero la ola de ira retrocede antes de alzarse.{/n} «Dejando a un lado sus actos anteriores, admito que ahora está tomando una decisión honrada. Reconozco su derecho a elegir su propia sentencia: por la Lex Imperialis, que esto se tome en cuenta cuando se enfrente a su juicio final».

languages.text: {n}Une ride de colère se forme entre les sourcils de Solomorne, mais il parvient à juguler sa fureur.{/n} « En dépit de votre passé, je dois admettre que vous faites le bon choix, cette fois-ci. Je vous accorde le droit de choisir votre propre sentence : par la Lex Imperialis, puisse cet acte être pris en considération lorsque vous vous soumettrez à votre jugement final. »
languages.original_text: {n}A furious line cuts across Solomorne's brow, but the wave of anger recedes before it can rise.{/n} "Whatever your past deeds, I admit that you are making an honourable choice now. I recognise your right to choose your own sentence — by the Lex Imperialis, may this act be taken into account when you face your final judgement."

traits.locale_text: {n}Une ride de colère se forme entre les sourcils de Solomorne, mais il parvient à juguler sa fureur.{/n} « En dépit de votre passé, je dois admettre que vous faites le bon choix, cette fois-ci. Je vous accorde le droit de choisir votre propre sentence : par la Lex Imperialis, puisse cet acte être pris en considération lorsque vous vous soumettrez à votre jugement final. »

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンの眉に激しい皺が刻まれた。だが、その怒りは湧き上がる前に引いていった。{/n}「過去の行いがどうであれ、今お前が立派な選択をしていることは認める。自身の判決を選ぶ権利を認めよう。レックス・インペリアによれば、この行為は最後の審判の際に考慮されるべきだ」
languages.original_text: {n}A furious line cuts across Solomorne's brow, but the wave of anger recedes before it can rise.{/n} "Whatever your past deeds, I admit that you are making an honourable choice now. I recognise your right to choose your own sentence — by the Lex Imperialis, may this act be taken into account when you face your final judgement."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンの眉に激しい皺が刻まれた。だが、その怒りは湧き上がる前に引いていった。{/n}「過去の行いがどうであれ、今お前が立派な選択をしていることは認める。自身の判決を選ぶ権利を認めよう。レックス・インペリアによれば、この行為は最後の審判の際に考慮されるべきだ」

languages.text: {n}Hiddetli bir çizgi, Solomorne'un kaşlarını bölse de öfke dalgası çabucak diniyor.{/n} "Geçmişte ne yapmış olursan ol, şu anda şerefli bir seçim yaptığını itiraf etmeliyim. Kendi cezanı seçme hakkını kullanabilirsin. Lex İmperialis adına... Bu yaptığın, nihai hükmünle yüzleştiğinde gözden kaçmasın."
languages.original_text: {n}A furious line cuts across Solomorne's brow, but the wave of anger recedes before it can rise.{/n} "Whatever your past deeds, I admit that you are making an honourable choice now. I recognise your right to choose your own sentence — by the Lex Imperialis, may this act be taken into account when you face your final judgement."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hiddetli bir çizgi Solomorne'un kaşlarını bölüyor, fakat öfke dalgası yükselmeden diniyor.{/n} "Geçmişte ne yapmış olursan ol şu anda şerefli bir seçim yaptığını itiraf etmeliyim. Kendi cezanı seçme hakkını kullanabilirsin. Lex Imperialis adına, bu yaptığın son hükmünle yüzleştiğinde karşına çıksın."

languages.text: {n}Eine Zornesfalte erscheint auf Solomornes Stirn, aber die Welle der Wut legt sich, bevor sie sich erheben kann.{/n} "Ungeachtet Eurer früheren Taten räume ich ein, dass Ihr nun eine ehrbare Entscheidung trefft. Ich erkenne Euer Recht an, Eure Strafe selbst zu bestimmen – das wird vor dem Lex Imperia berücksichtigt werden, wenn Ihr Euer letztes Urteil erhaltet."
languages.original_text: {n}A furious line cuts across Solomorne's brow, but the wave of anger recedes before it can rise.{/n} "Whatever your past deeds, I admit that you are making an honourable choice now. I recognise your right to choose your own sentence — by the Lex Imperialis, may this act be taken into account when you face your final judgement."

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine Zornesfalte erscheint auf Solomornes Stirn, aber die Welle der Wut legt sich, bevor sie sich erheben kann.{/n} "Ungeachtet Eurer früheren Taten räume ich ein, dass Ihr nun eine ehrbare Entscheidung trefft. Ich erkenne Euer Recht an, Eure Strafe selbst zu bestimmen – das wird vor dem Lex Imperia berücksichtigt werden, wenn Ihr Euer letztes Urteil erhaltet."
